question: 埋める
sourceAnswer:
<read>うずめる</read>:: to{} cover/bury-(e.g.-one's-face-in-hands)/submerge | fill-(completely)/stuff/pack/cram/fill-up
<read>うめる</read>:: to{} bury-(e.g.-in-the-ground) | fill-up-(e.g.-audience-fills-a-hall)/cause-to-be-packed | plug-(a-gap)/stop-(a-gap)/bridge-(a-difference,-a-gap)/fill-(a-seat,-a-vacant-position)/fill-out | make-up-for-(a-loss,-shortage,-etc.)/make-amends/compensate-for | put-cold-water-(in-a-bath) | cover/scatter-something-over
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>bury</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to bury</vocabulary> as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You learned this reading with the kanji, how nice for you!
